poems.title: The Song About the Song
poems.content: This ithe songs about the show!
poems.author: Bryan Higgins

poems.title: My Pickle
poems.content: ...may my pickle stroll about hungryand fthe sky over him with one bite.
poems.author: Jon Glass

poems.title: Ithaca
poems.content: When you set out on your journey to Ithaot carry them within your soul, if your soul does not set them up before you. Pray that the road is long....
poems.author: T Y Alevizos

poems.title: The Visitor
poems.content: A ferret visited my house with little tiny cymbals. I felt that I should pur friends but still you'll have to pay.
poems.author: Alan R. Turner.
